title: 全自动豪华铺路机  （方块科技） 建筑专用
author: liuyinyu128
txt_content:
这里是cctv
此乃超级高科技的元芳方块牌全自动豪华铺路机 ！
他在这里---[attach]343229[/attach]
它非常简便，但功能强大只要轻轻按下按钮




开啊开 矿车强势逆天，自动铺路！


瞬间就铺这么多，你也可以选择不铺木板，铺其它方块。

甚至可以都种方快一起铺
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1109763342/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/AQYT$LB%%60CV%7B]%7D%VF~H%7DYJL.jpg

真美丽

file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1109763342/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/88%7B%7B~LD%60$FT981JQ6L)7%7B40.jpg
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1109763342/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/88%7B%7B~LD%60$FT981JQ6L)7%7B40.jpg

开啊开，一直延伸到远方真是好方便
空中也可铺！

--------------------------------------------啦啦啦，我是分界线，啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦Sssss.......Boooom--------------------------------------------






提供代码复制


好疯狂，有木有！{:10_530:}
红字是可变选项，是你要铺的方块ID
默认铺成http://pan.baidu.com/s/1oYeQu
[gold_ore]  [log]  [cubblestone]（泥土块）（草方块）[stone]（草方块）（泥土块）[cubblestone]  [log]  [gold_ore]
/summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~-1 ~ 
{Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Command:"/setblock ~-2 ~-1 ~ 1 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 2 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~2 3 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~3 4 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~4 5 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~5 41 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-1 2 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-2 3 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-3 4 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-4 5 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-5 41 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~ 152 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~ 157 0 keep"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-2 ~ 152 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~ 157 0 keep"}复制代码其实你可以把所有红字改成TNT的方块ID，然后
Booooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooom




只需按照第一个图放，在命令方块中输入指令。
方便快捷，建筑的好帮手！{:10_525:}




我是不会告诉你这东西只能在X-----Y向使用



珍惜一下别人的劳动成果啊（金币人气）




对了，还有这里不是cctv

replies.txt_content:
拿出命令方块
输入指令~~~插上红石火把~~~，爆炸了。。。
吓死了，坑底出现命令方块矿车
